sentences.english: Second, conduct strict quality control on materials needed for the rebuilding of the earthquake-stricken area.

sentences.english: All work in India was to be done by architects imported from Britain.

sentences.english: Food safety strictly control and care of life responsibility rushan.

sentences.english: Before you start packing up what’s left it’s time to toughen up.

It presents the aesthetic value and idea contained in the poem to the audience.

sentences.english: Through the autumn hypocritical to cry a few times, just check lady called aside.

sentences.english: All the products are subject to multiple strict quality checks and ran-dom sample tests.
